entry.title: Friday night: A few showers. Low 9.

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 22.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 40 gusting to 70 then southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 22. UV index 3 or moderate.
